name: Best Werewolf
query: SELECT t.participants.participant AS id, COALESCE(SUM(g.participant_score), 0) as Total_Score FROM results t CROSS JOIN UNNEST(t.results) AS r(res) CROSS JOIN UNNEST(res.detail.by_role.WEREWOLF.games) AS role(g) GROUP BY t.participants.participant ORDER BY Total_Score DESC
